_comment: Template for commands that support both SET and QUERY operations. For query-only commands, see COMMAND_JSON_TEMPLATE_QUERY_ONLY_EXAMPLE.json
description: Full description of what this command does. This should be a complete sentence explaining the command's purpose and behavior.
conditions: Optional: Any conditions or requirements (e.g., 'Requires option SR-AUDIO') or null
arguments:
Detailed description of arguments. For example:
HEADER<x> is the header number.
<NR1> specifies the numeric value.

examples.description: Description of what this example does.
Description of what this query returns.

shortDescription: Short description (first part of description, typically 80-100 characters)
name: CommandName

params.name: header
params.description: HEADER<x> where x is the header number (1-8)

_manualEntry.description: Full description of what this command does.
